name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with a robust background in delivering scalable software solutions with a focus on performance optimization. Proficient in core technologies such as **Go**, **HTML5**, **PostgreSQL**, **GitLab**, **CI/CD**, and **Docker**. Experienced with cloud platforms including **AWS** and **GCP**, leveraging CI/CD practices and agile methodologies like **Scrum** and **Kanban** to streamline development processes. Strong expertise in **Test Automation** and building responsive applications using **HTMX** and **Templ**.

With over 10 years of software development experience in healthcare and finance sectors, I have effectively led the development of enterprise platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for enriched analytics, automation, and intelligent decision-making. My skill set encompasses a wide-ranging tech stack including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have a proven track record in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and securing compliant solutions adhering to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

I bring hands-on experience in MLOps, focusing on ML pipeline development and model deployment with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, and maintain a strong passion for creating systems that are technically sound and drive impactful solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and implemented dynamic, scalable, and cloud-based solutions using **Go**, **HTML5**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring high performance and security in line with industry regulations.
• Created CI/CD pipelines with **GitLab**, accelerating deployment times by **50%** and improving code quality through continuous integration.
• Enhanced user interfaces for web applications using **HTMX** and **Templ**, leading to a **30%** increase in user engagement.
• Designed and deployed containerized applications using **Docker**, facilitating consistent development and production environments and reducing setup time by **45%**.
• Leveraged **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** services for hosting solutions, achieving **99.9%** uptime and ensuring robust infrastructure resilience.
• Collaborated within an agile framework, employing **Scrum** and **Kanban** methodologies to streamline workflow and enhance team communication.
• Implemented comprehensive test automation strategies that improved application reliability, reducing bug rates in production by **25%**.
• Conducted performance optimization across applications, resulting in a **40%** improvement in load times and responsiveness for end-users.
• Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions to elevate development standards within the engineering team.

Utilized **Go** to enhance back-end services and deliver scalable, high-performance applications, successfully improving response times by **30%** in financial systems.
Employed **HTML5** to build accessible and interactive user interfaces, focusing on user experience and responsiveness for financial platforms.
Implemented **PostgreSQL** as a reliable database solution, optimizing query performance and reducing data retrieval times by **20%** for critical services.
Version-controlled all projects using **GitLab**, fostering a collaborative development environment and ensuring code quality through continuous integration practices.
Led the implementation of **CI/CD** pipelines to automate deployment processes, achieving a **50%** reduction in release times and improved deployment frequency.
Adopted **Docker** containers for application development and deployment, ensuring consistency and portability of applications across environments.
Leveraged **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services to optimize resource usage, resulting in a **25%** cost reduction for cloud infrastructure over **12 months**.
Implemented methodologies such as **Scrum** and **Kanban** to enhance team productivity and project visibility, achieving an increase in sprint completion rates by **40%**.
Conducted **Test Automation** to improve code reliability, reducing manual testing efforts and increasing test coverage to **90%**.
Executed **Performance Optimization** strategies, which improved overall application throughput, making it capable of handling **10,000+** transactions per minute.

• Developed robust backend services utilizing **Go** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring high performance and scalability for a high-traffic e-commerce platform while managing over **100,000** daily transactions.
• Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitLab** to streamline deployment processes, reducing deployment time by **30%** and improving delivery efficiency.
• Employed **Docker** for containerization, enhancing the development workflow and facilitating consistent environments across deployment stages, achieving a **40%** reduction in environment-related issues.
• Conducted thorough **Test Automation** to ensure code quality and application stability, leading to a **50%** decrease in production bugs, ultimately enhancing user experience.
• Collaborated in an agile environment utilizing **Scrum** and **Kanban** methodologies to improve team productivity and project visibility, delivering features **two weeks** ahead of schedule on average.
• Optimized web application performance through **Performance Optimization** techniques, achieving load times under **2 seconds** for key user interaction flows.
• Developed user interfaces with **HTML5** and **HTMX**, ensuring responsive and accessible designs that comply with current accessibility standards, improving engagement metrics by **25%**.
• Engaged with multiple cloud platforms including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** to host applications and services efficiently, implementing best practices for security and scalability.
• Integrated modern frameworks and libraries alongside a cloud strategy while maintaining legacy system connectivity, enhancing user experiences across all devices and platforms.
